statements: SELECT * FROM CustomerSpendingPatterns;
SELECT customer_name, total_spending FROM CustomerSpendingPatterns WHERE total_spending > 1000;
SELECT * FROM CustomerSpendingPatterns WHERE spending_category = 'Electronics';
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, total_spending FROM CustomerSpendingPatterns ORDER BY total_spending DESC;
SELECT customer_name, total_spending FROM CustomerSpendingPatterns WHERE customer_id = 3;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM CustomerSpendingPatterns;
SELECT * FROM CustomerSpendingPatterns WHERE total_spending > 1000;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, total_spending FROM CustomerSpendingPatterns WHERE spending_category = 'Food' ORDER BY total_spending DESC;
SELECT customer_name, total_spending FROM CustomerSpendingPatterns WHERE customer_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT customer_name, spending_category, total_spending FROM CustomerSpendingPatterns WHERE total_spending BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY customer_name ASC, total_spending DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_age FROM customers WHERE customer_age > 30;
SELECT transaction_amount FROM transactions WHERE transaction_amount >= 1000;
SELECT customer_name, transaction_amount, transaction_date FROM customers c JOIN transactions t ON c.customer_id = t.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_age > 30 ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers JOIN transactions ON customers.customer_id = transactions.customer_id WHERE transaction_amount > 1000;
SELECT customer_name, COUNT(transaction_id) AS transaction_count FROM customers LEFT JOIN transactions ON customers.customer_id = transactions.customer_id GROUP BY customer_name;

SELECT customer_name, AVG(transaction_amount) AS average_transaction_amount FROM customers JOIN transactions ON customers.customer_id = transactions.customer_id GROUP BY customer_name HAVING AVG(transaction_amount) > 500;

SELECT customer_name, MAX(transaction_date) AS latest_transaction_date FROM customers JOIN transactions ON customers.customer_id = transactions.customer_id GROUP BY customer_name ORDER BY latest_transaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_spending_patterns;
SELECT customer_name, total_spending FROM customer_spending_patterns WHERE credit_score > 700;

SELECT customer_name, product_name FROM customer_spending_patterns JOIN customer_products ON customer_spending_patterns.customer_id = customer_products.customer_id JOIN financial_products ON customer_products.product_id = financial_products.product_id;
SELECT customer_id, product_name, purchase_date FROM customer_products WHERE purchase_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY customer_id DESC;

SELECT customer_name, total_spending, product_type FROM customer_spending_patterns JOIN customer_products ON customer_spending_patterns.customer_id = customer_products.customer_id JOIN financial_products ON customer_products.product_id = financial_products.product_id WHERE total_spending > 1000 ORDER BY total_spending DESC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, total_spending, credit_score FROM customer_spending_patterns;
SELECT product_id, product_name, product_type, product_price FROM financial_products ORDER BY product_price ASC;
SELECT customer_id, product_id, purchase_date FROM customer_products WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM customer_spending_patterns WHERE total_spending > 1000;

SELECT customer_name, total_spending, product_name FROM customer_spending_patterns JOIN customer_products ON customer_spending_patterns.customer_id = customer_products.customer_id JOIN financial_products ON customer_products.product_id = financial_products.product_id ORDER BY total_spending DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT name, email FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, name, address FROM customers ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, transaction_date FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT product_id, name, price, category FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT name, email FROM customers
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000
SELECT customer_id, name, address FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 3
SELECT * FROM products ORDER BY price DESC
SELECT name, description FROM services WHERE price < 50
SELECT * FROM Customers;
SELECT name, email FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM Products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM Orders WHERE order_date >= '2022-01-01' AND order_date <= '2022-03-31';
SELECT customer_id, AVG(amount) AS avg_transaction_amount FROM Transactions GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT * FROM Customers;
SELECT name, email FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM Products WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT order_id, customer_id, product_id, quantity, order_date FROM Orders WHERE quantity >= 5 AND order_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(feedback_id) AS total_feedbacks FROM CustomerFeedback GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_feedbacks > 3;
